result.eng: It was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.

result.eng: We couldn't leave the house because of the rain.
result.ga: ní raibh muid ábalta an teach a fhágáil de bharr na báistí

result.eng: They made me an offer I couldn't refuse.

result.eng: I couldn't hear anything for the horse's trot.

result.eng: She had promised it to him – she couldn't back out now.

result.eng: She couldn't make sense of the day's events.

result.eng: An airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?

result.eng: All the children started laughing and couldn't stop.

result.eng: Babaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
